author: craigmcc
msg: Correctly use the <shortname> element in tag library descriptor (TLD)
files as the suggested prefix for each library.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a "delegate via RequestDispatcher.forward()" capability, analogous to
the "delegate via include" capability added yesterday.  This allows
working around the following limitations of RequestDispatcher.include():
- Included resources cannot set response headers or cookies
- Request path information for included resources is passed in request
attributes, so the resource needs to know it is being included

author: craigmcc
msg: When digesting recursive structures, allow the developer to distinguish
rules for the root node of the structure from nested nodes, by
deterministically matching the longest "*/xxx" pattern that is specified.
For example, if you are processing a structure:
you can distinguish between the root node (#1) and all the rest like this:

author: craigmcc
msg: Add debugging messages when ServletContext.getRequestDispatcher() returns
null, in the remaining cases where this did not occur.  Prevents
NullPointerException problems on mis-configured struts-config.xml files.

author: husted
msg: Revise installation instructions for iPortal. Submitted by John Ueltzhoeffer.
